## Discussion

An element aligned with the x-axis is parallel to that axis and faces the app from the side.

# x

**Type Property**

The x-axis of alignment.

## Declaration

```swift
static let x: SpatialTemplateElementAxis
```

## Discussion

An element aligned with the x-axis is parallel to that axis and faces the app from the side.
title: x
